prompt: Develop an expense tracker page with a minimalist pastel theme, featuring a soft gray background and pastel accent colors (lavender, mint, peach, sky blue). The current balance should be displayed at the top in a simple, flat card with large, clean typography and no shadows. Below, include a horizontal scrollable row of category cards (Food, Transport, Shopping, Bills) with pastel-colored borders and minimal icons. The transaction list should use a card-based design, with each transaction in a rounded card showing the title, category, date, and amount, with soft dividers. Use a Column layout with a ListView for transactions. Position the floating action button at the bottom center with a pastel mint color and a plus icon. Emphasize simplicity and Material Design 3 with generous spacing.
